bug.summary: 0.5.1 not deployable due to recent master change
bug.description:
Hello, v0.5.1 uses master in aws utils.sh on the istio dependencies. Thus it was removed throu: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/commit/f10f4fb954ad8617d0d6d35ba01356e4b19f3815>f10f4fb</denchmark-link>
There is also a patch here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/commit/d38b6e7c02cf487d86f001269a971bd13b48d08c>d38b6e7</denchmark-link>
But this last patch, I think should either:
use the KUBEFLOW_TAG instead of KUBEFLOW_VERSION or add the letter v in front of ${KUBEFLOW_VERSION} Otherwise it wont find anything as the url is: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.5.1/dependencies/istio/install/crds.yaml (containing the v)
Is there any chance to have v0.5.1 tag patched correctly?
